physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient was reported to be deficient in vitamin D with an appropriate secondary rise in serum parathyroid hormone levels.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After 3 months of consuming UVB-irradiated mushrooms, there was an increase in serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D levels from 17 nmol/l to 39 nmol/l and a decrease in parathyroid hormone levels from 9.30 pmol/l to 5.60 pmol/l.
